title: Cargo seg fault

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Immediate seg fault when calling `cargo build` on Ubuntu 20.04 x64. I tried this code: ```bash $ cargo new demo $ cargo build ``` I expected to see this happen: Build runs through. Instead, this happened: ``` error: failed to run `rustc` to learn about target-specific information Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc - --crate-name ___ --print=file-names --crate-type bin --crate-type rlib --crate-type dylib --crate-type cdylib --crate-type staticlib --crate-type proc-macro --print=sysroot --print=cfg` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference) ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0 (2fd73fabe 2021-03-23) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0 commit-date: 2021-03-23 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0 LLVM version: 11.0.1 ```
Backtrace

``` #0 0x000056105166febc in tcache_dalloc_large (tsd=, tcache=0x7f54f93fe0c0, ptr=0x7f54f8239260, binind=0, slow_path=false) at ../jemalloc/include/jemalloc/internal/tcache_inlines.h:203 203 ../jemalloc/include/jemalloc/internal/tcache_inlines.h: No such file or directory. [Current thread is 1 (Thread 0x7f54f93ff700 (LWP 28673))] (gdb) (gdb) bt #0 0x000056105166febc in tcache_dalloc_large (tsd=, tcache=0x7f54f93fe0c0, ptr=0x7f54f8239260, binind=0, slow_path=false) at ../jemalloc/include/jemalloc/internal/tcache_inlines.h:203 #1 arena_dalloc (tsdn=0x7f54f93fdf00, ptr=0x7f54f8239260, tcache=0x7f54f93fe0c0, alloc_ctx=, slow_path=false) at ../jemalloc/include/jemalloc/internal/arena_inlines_b.h:232 #2 idalloctm (tsdn=0x7f54f93fdf00, ptr=0x7f54f8239260, tcache=0x7f54f93fe0c0, alloc_ctx=, is_internal=false, slow_path=false) at ../jemalloc/include/jemalloc/internal/jemalloc_internal_inlines_c.h:118 #3 ifree (tsd=, ptr=0x7f54f8239260, tcache=0x7f54f93fe0c0, slow_path=false) at ../jemalloc/src/jemalloc.c:2222 #4 free (ptr=0x7f54f8239260) at ../jemalloc/src/jemalloc.c:2393 #5 0x00007f5502328741 in LLVMRustCreateTargetMachine () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #6 0x00007f55022c00ce in rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::target_machine_factory::{{closure}} () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #7 0x00007f55022bf4ff in rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::create_informational_target_machine () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #8 0x00007f5502316bff in ::target_features () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #9 0x00007f5502230ed8 in rustc_interface::util::create_session () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #10 0x00007f55021fede5 in rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #11 0x00007f55021f7d05 in rustc_span::with_session_globals () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #12 0x00007f55021ff36a in std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #13 0x00007f550221bc4a in core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable-shim}} () from /home/max/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-7ea116e55de24565.so #14 0x00007f54ff668c8a in as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once () at /rustc/2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1521 #15 as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once () at /rustc/2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1521 #16 std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start () at /rustc/2fd73fabe469357a12c2c974c140f67e7cdd76d0//library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:71 #17 0x00007f54ff55b609 in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 #18 0x00007f54ff46f293 in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6```
